name: Cereyan
description:
Greetings!

Cereyan is a puzzle platformer game where we try to pass the levels by completing the connections between electricity

Does It Have a Story?

No, it doesn't have the story

This game was made in 3 hours + 5 hours for Trijam 162 hosted by Trijam

Gameplay and Controls

Our goal in the game is to complete the circuits that are connected to each other while placing the batteries after solving the puzzles. After solving the puzzles, you can move on to the next level with the door that opens

Well, how to play this game?

Jump: W
Left: A
Right: D
Hmmmm... Interesting 🤔

Who Play This Game?

• I think nobody won't play this game
• My mom & dad

System Requirements

You can even play on a Hyundai H100

Credits

Sami Vartokgöz - Programmer
Alperen Güner - Pixel Artist
Taha Türkoğlu - Level Designer
Kardelen Erdinç - Musician
